content: As an AI language model, I'm glad that I could help. Yes, it can be difficult to be assertive, especially when we have been conditioned to prioritize the needs and wants of others over our own. However, setting boundaries is an important part of taking care of ourselves and promoting healthy and respectful relationships with others. Remember, it is okay to prioritize your own needs and well-being and to communicate them assertively. With practice, it will become easier, and you will find that you are better able to build healthy and fulfilling relationships. Good luck!
